name: CielClou
description:
--シエルクロウ

It is a first person shooter.
As you defeat enemies, the % in the upper right corner increases,
 and when it reaches 100%, the boss will appear.
The game ends when all five stages are cleared.

[Important]:
If the processing is heavy, please connect the power supply to the PC.(probably needed...)動作が重い場合、PCを電源に接続してください(おそらく必須…)

The cursor disappears when you click on the screen.
Press the L key to turn the mouse cursor on and off.
Press K key to turn on/off full screen.

If your screen is large, set the scale to 100% in your PC settings or Try full screen.

Deepl translation tool is used. Grammar may be incorrect.
This game is in Japanese, but it is fine to play.

■ Operation
Normal
WASD: Move Left click: Shoot Right click: Switch weapon
Keyboard only
Direction key: Move Z: Shoot X,C: Turn V: Switch weapon

Gamepad (slightly not recommended) RT:Shoot LT:Switch weapons

(menu Z: Decide X: Back)
■ Specifications and Tips
When you kill an enemy with the shotgun, you can use the nail gun's ammunition.
If you defeat an enemy with a nail gun, you will get HP and shield recovery items.
This is an important specification for survival, so remember it.

The nail gun is by far the most powerful, but it runs out of ammunition quickly.
Use it with the shotgun as appropriate.

You can probably survive if you keep running around.
For boss fights, use the nail gun to get rid of them quickly.
